== Welcome ==
Welcome to Ubuntu Christian Edition otherwise known as UCE! UCE is simple the standard Ubuntu with church based software to cater to specific needs that may be found within churches of all denominations.

== UCE Mission Statment ==
Ubuntu Christian Edition aim's to provide a safe, stable and secure OS with emphasis on enabling church organization's of all denominations to use UCE to help facilitate in meeting their organization needs.
